thread.title: Mariners fire Lloyd McClendon after 2 seasons
thread.title_full: Mariners fire Lloyd McClendon after 2 seasons

title: Mariners fire Lloyd McClendon after 2 seasons
text: > Top News Mariners fire Lloyd McClendon after 2 seasons FILE - In this Oct. 3, 2015, file photo, Seattle Mariners manager Lloyd McClendon points towards first base while questioning an umpire's call in the first inning of a baseball game against the Oakland Athletics in Seattle. The Mariners have fired manager Lloyd McClendon after two seasons, Friday, Oct. 9, 2015, less than a week after the Mariners concluded a disappointing 76-86 season.(AP Photo/Ted S. Warren, File)
